definition: fill, as with a certain quality
details:
verb
- fill, as with a certain quality
= synonyms: tincture
- teach and impress by frequent repetitions or admonitions
= synonyms: infuse
- produce or try to produce a vivid impression of
= synonyms: impress
- enter drop by drop
= example: enter drop by drop
= synonyms: instil
- impart gradually
= example: impart gradually
= synonyms: transfuse
